rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that aligns with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and a view of the garden. Designed to enhance connectivity with the outdoor space.
Dining area situated near the kitchen for ease of service, adhering to traditional Kerala design elements.
Functional modern kitchen with traditional Kerala motifs in cabinetry and backsplash. Vastu compliant placement ensures balanced energy.
A cozy library room offering ample space for books and quiet study, with natural lighting through strategically placed windows.
Luxurious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that ensure privacy and provide a calming view of the garden, in line with Kerala aesthetics.
Guest bedroom designed for comfort and convenience. Vastu-aligned placement ensures balanced energy.
Additional bedroom maintaining traditional Kerala style with modern amenities.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala entrance door ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the back wall for natural light and a view of the garden.
Side windows enhancing cross ventilation as per Vastu principles.

garden_features.description: A well-landscaped garden with native flora and water features, designed to complement the traditional Kerala aesthetic.
